name: remix-knowledge-base (AlexandroMtzG)
description: [项目级] Knowledge Base starter kit with WYSIWYG, Markdown, GPT, and Multi-language support. Built with Remix, Tailwind CSS and Prisma.。来源: https://github.com/AlexandroMtzG/remix-knowledge-base

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Knowledge Base starter kit with WYSIWYG, Markdown, GPT, and Multi-language support. Built with Remix, Tailwind CSS and Prisma.

来源: https://github.com/AlexandroMtzG/remix-knowledge-base
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 84

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
app
app/application
app/assets
app/components
app/entry.client.tsx
app/entry.server.tsx
app/helpers
app/lib
app/modules

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **WYSIWYG** editor: [Tiptap](https://tiptap.dev/) editor with AI-powered suggestions (thanks to [Novel.sh](https://novel.sh/?ref=saasrock-kb))
- **Markdown** editor: [Monaco](https://github.com/suren-atoyan/monaco-react) editor with markdown support.
- **Multi-knowlege-base** support: Create multiple knowledge bases for different purposes.
- **Multi-language** support: Add categories and articles in multiple languages.
- **Simple Analytics**: Views, Upvotes, and Downvotes tracking.
- **Image storage** with Supabase: Upload article images to [Supabase](https://supabase.io) Storage.
- **SEO**:
